title: Processes - Integrate by Linear Partial Fractions

content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral, of, the fraction with numerator x plus 1, and denominator x times, open parenthesis, x plus 3, close parenthesis, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="one third times the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, two thirds times the natural log of the absolute value of x plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mo>+</mo></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mi>C</mi></mstyle></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third times the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, two ninths times the natural log of the absolute value of x plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mo>+</mo></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mi>C</mi></mstyle></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, one third times the natural log of the absolute value of x plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mo>+</mo></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mi>C</mi></mstyle></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, one ninth times the natural log of the absolute value of x plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mo>+</mo></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mi>C</mi></mstyle></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one third times the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, two thirds times the natural log of the absolute value of x plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mo>+</mo></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="false"><mi>C</mi></mstyle></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.12: (BC ONLY) Integrating Using Linear Partial Fractions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
